U

undo() - Method in class org.klotski.coding.BoardImp
Undoes the last move, removing it from the stack and moving back the Block
undo() - Method in class org.klotski.controller.UndoController
Function to undo the previous move.
undo() - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.Window
Called when undoes the previous move, underline the correct button
UndoController - Class in org.klotski.controller
UndoController is a controller class that is used to undo previous move.
It dialogues with Window, GameSaver, BoardImp, Board
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
UndoController(Window) - Constructor for class org.klotski.controller.UndoController
This constructor saved data from Window
UP - Static variable in class org.klotski.coding.BoardImp
The up direction
UP - Static variable in class org.klotski.graphics.Block
Define the UP direction
updateScore(String, int) - Method in class org.klotski.coding.HighScoreUpdater
Update a user's score if there's the user in the list
UsernameCollector - Class in org.klotski.coding
UsernameCollector reads a list of users in users.txt file, placed in resources/users_record.
It stores every user and can select one of them.
It is also possible to add a new user and write it in the txt file,
he stores it in a Vector.
It also gives the list of users, writing before the last used user.
UsernameCollector() - Constructor for class org.klotski.coding.UsernameCollector
Constructor that tries to read users.txt with UsernameCollector.readUsers().
If there is no "users.txt" file, it tries to create one.
